message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $1,000,000.  What are your thoughts?
Alice, while I see the value in this product, $1,000,000 is outside my budget. I'm willing to offer $850,000. This is my best offer, as it's the maximum I can afford. Let me know your thoughts.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but the value of this product to me is quite significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $950,000. This is a very competitive price for what you're getting.

Alice, I understand your position, but $950,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $900,000, which is a fair price considering the value of the product and my budget. This is my final offer.
